author: Agastya
uniqueness: The uniqueness of the "Agastya Samhita" lies in its purported insights into ancient ndian knowledge of chemistry, alchemy, and technology. It provides a glimpse into the Cientific and technological advancements that were reportedly known in ancient times.

author: Aryabhatta
toc: The Surya Siddhanta covers a wide range of astronomical topics, including planetary motion, solar and lunar eclipses, trigonometric functions, time measurement, and cosmology. It provides mathematical formulas and methods for performing astronomical calculations..
uniqueness: He "Surya Siddanta" covers a wide range of astronomical topics, including planetary motion, solar and lunar eclipses, trigonometric functions, time measurement and cosmology. It provides mathematical formulas and methods for performing astronomical calculation.
